Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Correna Knepp
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my school and so far it meets our needs.  There's no need for the camera to reset, just point at your subject and keep on clicking.  It will take continuous pictures.  The 8gb SD card was missing, but I emailed the company it came from, they apologized profusely and said they would send one right out.  That was a few day ago and I haven't received it yet, but I'm sure it will arrive soon.  If it doesn't, I will update my post.  All in all, I am very happy this purchase and may purchase one for my daughter's upcoming Birthday.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Mark Lusk
Reviews.Content: Bought this for the wife and she loves it. The smile detection is a pretty cool feature. Sleek design and surprisingly light. I would suggest getting a case though so you don't ruin your investment.

Reviews.Title: very disappoitment
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo Nascimento
Reviews.Content: i bought it cause i read that if i buy i will get a memory card 8g but, the câmera arrive and the memory card no.now i will go spend Money for buy a new memory card.it's very boring because i'm come back to brazil in the next Friday.the câmera are great but without memory card doesn't work good....i'm sad with yours.
